item.title: Click here to support We Need Arlene by Arlene Roberts
item.description:
Click here to support We Need Arlene by Arlene Roberts

We need Arlene! This campaign was created on behalf of Arlene Robert's cancer fight. Arlene has a rare form of hormonal cancer that is agressive and fast growing. The cancer is in her breasts, lymph nodes and spine. She is undergoing chemotherapy. Expenses are running high and help is needed!

item.title: The Lotus and the Artichoke - MALAYSIA Vegan Cookbook
Spencer Harber - Teacher Profile | Yoga Alliance
AiDj
item.description:
AiDj

I hope all that visit give the sounds a listen. Thank you to all the producers here continuing to put out intelligent quality tracks that keep my love of spinning music strong. -AiDj

item.title: Amusing Ourselves To Death-NSB Future Breakz Live Guest Mix 4-5-2013 by AiDj
item.description:
Amusing Ourselves To Death-NSB Future Breakz Live Guest Mix 4-5-2013 by AiDj

This set opens with a forward from Neil Postman's, "Amusing Ourselves to Death" which explains our inevitable demise at the hands of the entertainment industry, social media, technology, etc. I realize the irony due to the medium I chose to tell my story, but this selection of tracks and unusual soundbites best delivers this wake up call.

item.title: A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable
item.description:
A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable

There are many reasons to hate flying economy. The tiny seats, the inedible food, the fees airlines charge for things you'd get for free in a medieval dungeon. Manon KÃ¼hne can't fix any of that, but she's has found one small way to make sitting in 17C just a bit less hellish.

item.title: Why You Need to Love Yourself More
item.description:
Why You Need to Love Yourself More

I used to believe that love meant putting everyone else and their needs first, before my own. While I do think there is some truth to that, in the sense that being a giving person is one of the ultimate acts of being a loving person, I came to realize that I must give to and love myself first and foremost.
